text: The Terminator is a fictional character from The Terminator. He first appeared in the 1984 movie The Terminator before becoming a protagonist starting with Terminator 2: Judgment Day. ==Portrayals== He has been portrayed in movies by Arnold Schwarzenegger and in Mortal Kombat 11 with his likeness used but voiced by Chris Cox. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1984 Category:Science fiction movie characters Category:Terminator (franchise)
title: Terminator (character)
